00035 using namespace pwiz::minimxml;
00036 using boost::shared_ptr;

00038 
00039 ostream* os_ = 0;
00040 
00041 
00042 void test(bool indexed)
00043 {
00044     if (os_) *os_ << "test(): indexed=\"" << boolalpha << indexed << "\"\n";
00045 
00046     MSData tiny;
00047     examples::initializeTiny(tiny);
00048 
00049     Serializer_mzML::Config config;
00050     config.indexed = indexed;
00051     Serializer_mzML serializer(config);  
00052 
00053     ostringstream oss;
00054     serializer.write(oss, tiny);
00055 
00056     if (os_) *os_ << "oss:\n" << oss.str() << endl;
00057 
00058     shared_ptr<istream> is(new istringstream(oss.str()));
00059 
00060     // dummy would normally be read in from file
00061   
00062     MSData dummy;
00063 
00064     // so we don't have any dangling references
00065     //dummy.instrumentPtrs.push_back(InstrumentPtr(new Instrument("LCQ_Deca")));
00066     dummy.dataProcessingPtrs.push_back(DataProcessingPtr(new DataProcessing("pwizconversion")));
00067     dummy.dataProcessingPtrs.push_back(DataProcessingPtr(new DataProcessing("XcaliburProcessing")));
00068 
00069     ChromatogramListPtr sl = ChromatogramList_mzML::create(is, dummy, indexed);
00070 
00071     // check easy functions
00072 
00073     unit_assert(sl.get());
00074     unit_assert(sl->size() == 2);
00075     unit_assert(sl->find ("tic") == 0);
00076     unit_assert(sl->findNative("tic native") == 0);
00077     unit_assert(sl->find("sic") == 1);
00078     unit_assert(sl->findNative("sic native") == 1);
00079 
00080     // check tic
00081 
00082     ChromatogramPtr s = sl->chromatogram(0); // read without binary data
00083     unit_assert(s.get());
00084     unit_assert(s->id == "tic");
00085     unit_assert(s->nativeID == "tic native");
00086     unit_assert(s->binaryDataArrayPtrs.empty());
00087 
00088     unit_assert(sl->chromatogramIdentity(0).index == 0);
00089     unit_assert(sl->chromatogramIdentity(0).id == "tic");
00090     unit_assert(sl->chromatogramIdentity(0).nativeID == "tic native");
00091  
00092     ChromatogramPtr s_cache = sl->chromatogram(0); // cache read
00093     unit_assert(s_cache.get() == s.get());
00094 
00095     s = sl->chromatogram(0, true); // read with binary data
00096     unit_assert(s_cache.get() != s.get());
00097 
00098     vector<TimeIntensityPair> pairs;
00099     s->getTimeIntensityPairs(pairs);
00100     unit_assert(pairs.size() == 15);
00101     for (int i=0; i<15; i++)
00102         unit_assert(pairs[i].time==i && pairs[i].intensity==15-i);
00103 
00104     // check sic
00105 
00106     s = sl->chromatogram(1, true);
00107     unit_assert(s.get());
00108     unit_assert(s->id == "sic");
00109     unit_assert(s->nativeID == "sic native");
00110 
00111     unit_assert(sl->chromatogramIdentity(1).index == 1);
00112     unit_assert(sl->chromatogramIdentity(1).id == "sic");
00113     unit_assert(sl->chromatogramIdentity(1).nativeID == "sic native");
00114 
00115     pairs.clear();
00116     s->getTimeIntensityPairs(pairs);
00117     unit_assert(pairs.size() == 10);
00118     for (int i=0; i<10; i++)
00119         unit_assert(pairs[i].time==i && pairs[i].intensity==(10-i));
00120 }
00121 
00122 
00123 void test()
00124 {
00125     bool indexed = true;
00126     test(indexed);
00127 
00128     indexed = false;
00129     test(indexed);
00130 }
00131 
00132 
00133 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00134 {
00135     try
00136     {
00137         if (argc>1 && !strcmp(argv[1],"-v")) os_ = &cout;
00138         test();
00139         return 0;
00140     }
00141     catch (exception& e)
00142     {
00143         cerr << e.what() << endl;
00144         return 1;
00145     }
00146     catch (...)
00147     {
00148         cerr << "Caught unknown exception.\n";
00149     }
00150 }
